mapper.insert: Insert into allow_departments (allowd_id, allowd_name, department_id) values(#{allowdId}, #{allowdName}, #{departmentId})
mapper.select: select allowd_id, allowd_name , ad.department_id, department_name from allow_departments ad left join department d on ad.department_id = d.department_id where allowd_id=#{allowdId}
